name: French Knight Rush
description: Exploits French faster [icon:villager] production. Fast Feudal into [icon:knight] Royal Knight harassment.

steps.description: 6 villagers to [icon:sheep] sheep. Rally [icon:scout] scout to sheep.
1st new [icon:villager] builds [icon:house] house, then rallies to [icon:gold] gold.
2nd new [icon:villager] builds [icon:mining_camp] Mining Camp on [icon:gold] gold. 3rd new villager to [icon:gold] gold.
4th new [icon:villager] to [icon:food] food. Total 7 on food.
5th new [icon:villager] to [icon:wood] wood. Build [icon:lumber_camp] Lumber Camp.
Rally new villagers to [icon:food] food. Total 10 on food.
[icon:feudal_age] Age up with [icon:landmark] School of Cavalry! Use 2 villagers from food to build.
Shift 2 villagers from food to [icon:wood] wood. Rally new villagers to [icon:wood] wood.
[icon:feudal_age] Feudal Age! Produce [icon:knight] Royal Knights. Research [icon:upgrade] Chivalry.
